revised_title: Advances in Battery Technologies and Their Applications
tldr: This article discusses the advancements in battery development over the past decade, focusing on lithium-based systems for consumer electronics and larger battery systems for traction applications. It also explores high-temperature batteries, lithium-polymer batteries, and the potential use of hydrogen-based fuel cells in small, low-power devices. The authors emphasize the need for government support and legislation to encourage the adoption of zero-pollution vehicles and renewable energy sources.
